Lists Implemented Distributions

Source: R/listDistributions.R
listDistributions.Rd

Lists distr6 distributions in a data.table or a character vector, can be filtered by traits, implemented package, and tags.

listDistributions(simplify = FALSE, filter = NULL)

Arguments

simplify

logical. If FALSE (default) returns distributions with traits as a data.table, otherwise returns distribution names as characters.

filter

list to filter distributions by. See examples.

Value

Either a list of characters (if simplify is TRUE) or a data.table of SDistributions and their traits.

See also

SDistribution

Examples

listDistributions()
#>       ShortName               ClassName    Type ValueSupport  VariateForm
#>  1:         Arc                 Arcsine       ℝ   continuous   univariate
#>  2:        Bern               Bernoulli      ℕ0     discrete   univariate
#>  3:        Beta                    Beta      ℝ+   continuous   univariate
#>  4:      BetaNC          BetaNoncentral      ℝ+   continuous   univariate
#>  5:       Binom                Binomial      ℕ0     discrete   univariate
#>  6:         Cat             Categorical       V     discrete   univariate
#>  7:      Cauchy                  Cauchy       ℝ   continuous   univariate
#>  8:       ChiSq              ChiSquared      ℝ+   continuous   univariate
#>  9:     ChiSqNC    ChiSquaredNoncentral      ℝ+   continuous   univariate
#> 10:       Degen              Degenerate       ℝ     discrete   univariate
#> 11:        Diri               Dirichlet [0,1]^K   continuous multivariate
#> 12:       DUnif         DiscreteUniform       ℤ     discrete   univariate
#> 13:         Emp               Empirical       ℝ     discrete   univariate
#> 14:       EmpMV             EmpiricalMV       ℝ     discrete multivariate
#> 15:      Erlang                  Erlang      ℝ+   continuous   univariate
#> 16:         Exp             Exponential      ℝ+   continuous   univariate
#> 17:           F           FDistribution      ℝ+   continuous   univariate
#> 18:         FNC FDistributionNoncentral      ℝ+   continuous   univariate
#> 19:        Frec                 Frechet       ℝ   continuous   univariate
#> 20:       Gamma                   Gamma      ℝ+   continuous   univariate
#> 21:        Geom               Geometric      ℕ0     discrete   univariate
#> 22:        Gomp                Gompertz      ℝ+   continuous   univariate
#> 23:        Gumb                  Gumbel      ℝ+   continuous   univariate
#> 24:       Hyper          Hypergeometric      ℕ0     discrete   univariate
#> 25:    InvGamma            InverseGamma      ℝ+   continuous   univariate
#> 26:         Lap                 Laplace       ℝ   continuous   univariate
#> 27:         Log             Logarithmic      ℕ0     discrete   univariate
#> 28:       Logis                Logistic       ℝ   continuous   univariate
#> 29:      LLogis             Loglogistic      ℝ+   continuous   univariate
#> 30:       Lnorm               Lognormal      ℝ+   continuous   univariate
#> 31:     Matdist                 Matdist     ℝ^K     discrete   univariate
#> 32:    Multinom             Multinomial    ℕ0^K     discrete multivariate
#> 33:   MultiNorm      MultivariateNormal     ℝ^K   continuous multivariate
#> 34:      NBinom        NegativeBinomial      ℕ0     discrete   univariate
#> 35:        Norm                  Normal       ℝ   continuous   univariate
#> 36:        Pare                  Pareto      ℝ+   continuous   univariate
#> 37:        Pois                 Poisson      ℕ0     discrete   univariate
#> 38:        Rayl                Rayleigh      ℝ+   continuous   univariate
#> 39: ShiftLLogis      ShiftedLoglogistic      ℝ+   continuous   univariate
#> 40:           T                StudentT       ℝ   continuous   univariate
#> 41:         TNC      StudentTNoncentral       ℝ   continuous   univariate
#> 42:         Tri              Triangular       ℝ   continuous   univariate
#> 43:        Unif                 Uniform       ℝ   continuous   univariate
#> 44:        Wald                    Wald      ℝ+   continuous   univariate
#> 45:     Weibull                 Weibull      ℝ+   continuous   univariate
#> 46:  WeightDisc        WeightedDiscrete       ℝ     discrete   univariate
#>       ShortName               ClassName    Type ValueSupport  VariateForm
#>        Package     Tags                  Alias
#>  1:          -   limits                     AS
#>  2:      stats                               B
#>  3:      stats                              BT
#>  4:      stats                            BTNC
#>  5:      stats   limits                BM, Bin
#>  6:          -                               C
#>  7:      stats locscale                     CH
#>  8:      stats                    CSQ, CHI, C2
#>  9:      stats              CSQNC, CHINC, C2NC
#> 10:          -   limits DGN, Deg, Delta, Dirac
#> 11: extraDistr                             DRC
#> 12: extraDistr   limits                     DU
#> 13:          -                               E
#> 14:          -                             EMV
#> 15:      stats                              ER
#> 16:      stats    scale                     EX
#> 17:      stats                              FD
#> 18:      stats                            FDNC
#> 19: extraDistr locscale                     FR
#> 20:      stats                          G, Gam
#> 21:      stats                         GM, Geo
#> 22:          -                        GPZ, Gom
#> 23: extraDistr locscale                GB, Gum
#> 24:      stats   limits                    HGM
#> 25: extraDistr                      IG, InvGam
#> 26: extraDistr locscale                     LP
#> 27: extraDistr                               L
#> 28:      stats locscale                     LG
#> 29:     actuar                         LL, LLG
#> 30:      stats                              LN
#> 31:          -                              MD
#> 32: extraDistr   limits                     MN
#> 33:          - locscale                    MVN
#> 34:          -   limits                     NB
#> 35:      stats locscale                      N
#> 36: extraDistr                         PR, Par
#> 37:      stats                    P, Poi, Pois
#> 38: extraDistr    scale                RY, Ray
#> 39:          -                             SLL
#> 40:      stats                              ST
#> 41:      stats                            STNC
#> 42: extraDistr   limits                     TR
#> 43:      stats   limits                 U, Uni
#> 44: extraDistr                               W
#> 45:      stats                        WB, Weib
#> 46:          -                              WD
#>        Package     Tags                  Alias

# Filter list
listDistributions(filter = list(VariateForm = "univariate"))
#>       ShortName               ClassName Type ValueSupport VariateForm
#>  1:         Arc                 Arcsine    ℝ   continuous  univariate
#>  2:        Bern               Bernoulli   ℕ0     discrete  univariate
#>  3:        Beta                    Beta   ℝ+   continuous  univariate
#>  4:      BetaNC          BetaNoncentral   ℝ+   continuous  univariate
#>  5:       Binom                Binomial   ℕ0     discrete  univariate

#>  7:      Cauchy                  Cauchy    ℝ   continuous  univariate
#>  8:       ChiSq              ChiSquared   ℝ+   continuous  univariate
#>  9:     ChiSqNC    ChiSquaredNoncentral   ℝ+   continuous  univariate
#> 10:       Degen              Degenerate    ℝ     discrete  univariate
#> 11:       DUnif         DiscreteUniform    ℤ     discrete  univariate
#> 12:         Emp               Empirical    ℝ     discrete  univariate

# Filter is case-insensitive
listDistributions(filter = list(VaLuESupport = "discrete"))
#>      ShortName        ClassName Type ValueSupport  VariateForm    Package
#>  1:       Bern        Bernoulli   ℕ0     discrete   univariate      stats
#>  2:      Binom         Binomial   ℕ0     discrete   univariate      stats
#>  3:        Cat      Categorical    V     discrete   univariate          -
#>  4:      Degen       Degenerate    ℝ     discrete   univariate          -
#>  5:      DUnif  DiscreteUniform    ℤ     discrete   univariate extraDistr
#>  6:        Emp        Empirical    ℝ     discrete   univariate          -
#>  7:      EmpMV      EmpiricalMV    ℝ     discrete multivariate          -
#>  8:       Geom        Geometric   ℕ0     discrete   univariate      stats
#>  9:      Hyper   Hypergeometric   ℕ0     discrete   univariate      stats
#> 10:        Log      Logarithmic   ℕ0     discrete   univariate extraDistr
#> 11:    Matdist          Matdist  ℝ^K     discrete   univariate          -
#> 12:   Multinom      Multinomial ℕ0^K     discrete multivariate extraDistr
#> 13:     NBinom NegativeBinomial   ℕ0     discrete   univariate          -
#> 14:       Pois          Poisson   ℕ0     discrete   univariate      stats
#> 15: WeightDisc WeightedDiscrete    ℝ     discrete   univariate          -
#>       Tags                  Alias
#>  1:                             B
#>  2: limits                BM, Bin
#>  3:                             C
#>  4: limits DGN, Deg, Delta, Dirac
#>  5: limits                     DU
#>  6:                             E
#>  7:                           EMV
#>  8:                       GM, Geo
#>  9: limits                    HGM
#> 10:                             L
#> 11:                            MD
#> 12: limits                     MN
#> 13: limits                     NB
#> 14:                  P, Poi, Pois
#> 15:                            WD

# Multiple filters
listDistributions(filter = list(VaLuESupport = "discrete", package = "extraDistr"))
#>    ShortName       ClassName Type ValueSupport  VariateForm    Package   Tags
#> 1:     DUnif DiscreteUniform    ℤ     discrete   univariate extraDistr limits
#> 2:       Log     Logarithmic   ℕ0     discrete   univariate extraDistr       
#> 3:  Multinom     Multinomial ℕ0^K     discrete multivariate extraDistr limits
#>    Alias
#> 1:    DU
#> 2:     L
#> 3:    MN
